item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Marked as resolved, bin is still full and litter spilling / being thrown on street outside our home., 20th December
item.description:
You have marked as resolved, this is not resolved and you have not provided a date for next scheduled Street cleanse. When can we expect this? We have small children who approach the bin, and have to tolerate the litter on the ground, thrown outside of our home due to the waste bin being full. Please provide a date or send someone immediately to resolve.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Roper Street, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet
